column4: try running "sudo cfdisk -P s /dev/sda". Does its partitions match hda on your SUSE? I'd like to know why Ubuntu does this renaming.
for the record, to get NOPASSWD working in sudoers, you have to place everything _after_ the "%admin ALL=(ALL) ALL" line.
